verbose_text: Conversely, in mesenchymal tumours the relationship between NG2 / CSPG4 expression and neoplastic transformation is different : NG2 / CSPG4 is constitutive of the mesenchymal progenitor / stem cells XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR from which sarcomas are thought to originate XREF_BIBR and becomes progressively upregulated with increasing malignancy XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR.
